00022 #ifndef MD_Vector_composite_included
00023 #define MD_Vector_composite_included
00024 #include <MD_Vector_std.h>
00025 #include <VectMD_Vector.h>
00026 #include <DoubleTabs.h>

00029 //
00030 //
00031 //
00032 //! Metadata for a distributed composite vector.<br>This class describes a vector that contains one or more sub-vectors (see P1bubble arrays),<br>each sub-vector has the same shape as the base vector, plus one dimension if shapes_[i] > 0<br>See also class DoubleTab_Parts and class ConstDoubleTab_Parts
00033 class MD_Vector_composite : public MD_Vector_base2
00034 {
00035   Declare_instanciable(MD_Vector_composite);
00036 public:
00037   void add_part(const MD_Vector& part, int shape = 0);
00038 
00039   int nb_parts() const
00040   {
00041     return data_.size();
00042   }
00043   const MD_Vector& get_desc_part(int i) const
00044   {
00045     return data_[i];
00046   }
00047   int get_shape(int i) const
00048   {
00049     return shapes_[i];
00050   }
00051   virtual void initialize_comm(const Echange_EV_Options& opt, Schema_Comm_Vecteurs&, DoubleVect&) const;
00052   virtual void prepare_send_data(const Echange_EV_Options& opt, Schema_Comm_Vecteurs&, DoubleVect&) const;
00053   virtual void process_recv_data(const Echange_EV_Options& opt, Schema_Comm_Vecteurs&, DoubleVect&) const;
00054   virtual void initialize_comm(const Echange_EV_Options& opt, Schema_Comm_Vecteurs&, IntVect&) const;
00055   virtual void prepare_send_data(const Echange_EV_Options& opt, Schema_Comm_Vecteurs&, IntVect&) const;
00056   virtual void process_recv_data(const Echange_EV_Options& opt, Schema_Comm_Vecteurs&, IntVect&) const;
00057 
00058   VECT(MD_Vector) data_;
00059 // Descriptor for the entire vector:
00060   MD_Vector_std global_md_;
00061 // Start index of the n-th part,
00062 // parts_offsets_[j] = SUM(i=0..j-1) of ( data_[i].valeure().nb_items_tot() * shapes[i] )
00063   ArrOfInt parts_offsets_;
00064 // Shape of each part of the array (see class DoubleTab_Parts)
00065   ArrOfInt shapes_;
00066 };
00067 
00068 #endif
